testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlArchivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.1.4 [Need for Detector Metadata] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Processing Documentation Metadata Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.6.2.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N21R1151_Send_Processing_Documentation_Metadata_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N21R1151_Send_Processing_Documentation_Metadata_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Archive Metadata is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.2.3.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N21R1156_Restrictions___Archive_Metadata_Supported = ${TMDD_N21R1156_Restrictions___Archive_Metadata_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Publication Date and Time is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.2.3.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N21R1157_Publication_Date_and_Time_Supported = ${TMDD_N21R1157_Publication_Date_and_Time_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Processing Method is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.2.3.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N21R1158_Processing_Method_Supported = ${TMDD_N21R1158_Processing_Method_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Processing Method Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.2.3.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N21R1159_Processing_Method_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N21R1159_Processing_Method_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Application Rules is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.2.3.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N21R1160_Application_Rules_Supported = ${TMDD_N21R1160_Application_Rules_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Enumeration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.2.3.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N21R1161_Enumeration_Supported = ${TMDD_N21R1161_Enumeration_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N21R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N21R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 13 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlArchivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N21R1151_Send_Processing_Documentation_Metadata_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 14 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 14.1 VERIFY that an archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg message was received.

Step 14.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.3 VERIFY that a last-update-date data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item

Step 14.4 VERIFY that a processing-metadata-name data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item

Step 14.5 VERIFY that a processing-metadata-version data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.6 IF TMDD_N21R1156_Restrictions___Archive_Metadata_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 14.6.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.7 IF TMDD_N21R1157_Publication_Date_and_Time_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 14.7.1 VERIFY that a publication-date-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.8 IF TMDD_N21R1158_Processing_Method_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 14.8.1 VERIFY that a processing-method-name data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.9 IF TMDD_N21R1159_Processing_Method_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 14.9.1 VERIFY that a processing-method-description data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.10 IF TMDD_N21R1160_Application_Rules_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 14.10.1 VERIFY that a processing-method-application-rules data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.11 IF TMDD_N21R1161_Enumeration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 14.11.1 VERIFY that a processing-method-results data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataProcessingDocumentationMetadataMsg.archived-data-processing-documentation-metadata-item
Step 14.12 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 15 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 15.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 15.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 15.7 IF TMDD_N21R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 15.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 16 EXIT
